skins.selfIntroduction: My background? Ehehe, I am the large light cruiser who only existed on paper, Neptune, so it is understandable that you have never heard of me before. Though I have yet to step onto the battlefield, my abilities are top notch... allow me to prove that to you in live combat~
skins.acquisition: Who am I? I am the Royal Navy's large light cruiser, Neptune. I shall see to it that you will never forget my name~? Yes, pleased to be of service~?
skins.login: That simply will not do, Commander, keeping me waiting all this time~
skins.details: Want to know about this? It's called a trident. Don't you think it's cool?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Unlike the other girls, this is my "maiden voyage" onto the battlefield. I wish to confirm for myself what this oft-touted "difference in experience" looks like.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, if you get on your knees and beg, "Please, Mistress Neptune," perhaps there would be a chance for something nice to happen?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, if you wish to taste my freshly-baked cake, then please first brew your finest tea~
skins.secretaryTouch: You would like to challenge me to a game? Very well. Do not expect me to hold back though, hehe~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: That simply will not do, Commander. You cannot seek to gain my attention that way.

skins.shipDescription: Hehe~ I usually let the other girls have all the glory, but even I must sometimes give you something to remember me by. Merry Christmas, Commander~
skins.acquisition: Hehe~ I usually let the other girls have all the glory, but even I must sometimes give you something to remember me by. Merry Christmas, Commander~
skins.details: My daily routine is nothing but missions and sorties, so it¡¯s nice to be able to get dressed up and have a good time. Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, if you kneel in front of me and beg, you might just get something very nice in return~ Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, did you already forget? If you want a present from me, you must first give me something that I¡¯d be satisfied with~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Since joining the fleet, I¡¯ve made a lot of friends. Especially Shropshire ¡ª she¡¯s both a good friend and a good rival.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, would you help me out with these presents that I prepared for Seattle¡¯s party? They¡¯re going to be for everyone~
